com.aleax.blight

Class CompilerSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aleax.blight.CompilerSettings

  • public class CompilerSettings
extends Object
    Stores compiler settings and defaults. The default settings are as follows:
    • template method = "execute"
    • replacement prefix = "write("
    • replacement suffix = ");"
    • extra code = "setCompiled(true);"
    • target class name suffix = null
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis

        public void setTemplateMethod(String methodName)

      • setExtraCode

        public void setExtraCode(String extraCode)
        Sets extra code to insert at the end of each compiled template. This is placed in an initialiser block at the end of the class.
        Parameters:
        extraCode - the extra code to insert.

      • getExtraCode

        public String getExtraCode()
        Retrieves the extra code to insert at the end of each compiled template. This is placed in an initialiser block at the end of the class.
        Returns:
        extraCode the extra code to insert.
